pos: nouns which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

lessons.japanese: ヤング夫人は、私が突然訪ねても気にしないでしょう。
lessons.english: Mrs. Young wouldn't mind my dropping in on her unexpectedly.

lessons.japanese: ヤング夫人は、私の突然の訪問を気にしなかった。
lessons.english: Mrs. Young didn't mind my dropping in on her unexpectedly.

lessons.japanese: ヤング氏は６台も車を持っている。
lessons.english: Mr Young has no less than six cars.

lessons.japanese: ヤング先生はとても優しい。
ヤングさんは息子がもっと勉強してくれる様にと願っている。
lessons.english: Mr. Young wishes his son would study harder.

lessons.english: Mrs. Young wouldn't mind my dropping in on her unexpectedly.

lessons.english: Mrs. Young didn't mind my dropping in on her unexpectedly.
